item.description:
Hashim Colombowala

Core experience

  • Building and deploying containerized applications to AWS EKS/Fargate. Core knowledge of AWS services and infrastructure.

  • Building scalable APIs and data models
  • Experience with software release management.
  • Highly knowledgeable with CI/CD systems like Buildkite, Jenkins and Drone.

Technical Skills

Toolset

  • Languages: Python, Kotlin, Golang, Bash, Groovy
